text: Mmarima na wͻ’di mmaa soͻ (anaasε wͻ’hwε wͻn soͻ), εnam sε Nyankopͻn ama ebinom so akyεn bi, εnam sε mmarima no na wͻ’yi wͻn sika anaa wͻn agyapadeε wͻ mmaa no ho. Ɛmmaa papa no brε wͻn ho ase, bͻ (wͻn kununom) kokoa mu adeε a Nyankopͻn abͻ ho ban no ho ban (wͻ berε a wͻn kununom nni hͻ). Na mmaa no a mosuro sε wͻ’yε asobrakyeε no, montu wͻn fo, (sε εno annyε yie a) montu nya wͻn wͻ kεtε so, (sε εno nso anyε yie a) montea wͻn. Nasε wͻ’tie mo a, monhwε na moanhwehwε kwan bi anfa antia wͻn. Nokorε sε, Nyankopͻn ne Okokroko, Ɔso kyεn biribiara
